about_the_game:
Elestrals Clash! reimagines the strategic battles of the Elestrals Trading Card Game (TCG) in a dynamic digital format, offering a cross-platform experience accessible on both desktop and mobile. Whether you’re a seasoned Caster or new to the adventure, this immersive, lore-rich game offers everything you need to compete for supremacy in the mythical world of Elestrals.

Explore a realm where the elemental forces of Earth, Fire, Water, Thunder, Wind, Frost, Solar, and Lunar collide in a battle for dominance. Each Caster will unlock, collect, and strategically deploy their enchanted creatures, known as Elestrals, to rise through the ranks and Ascend to Immortality. With a seamless, fully automated experience, players can now wield their decks anytime, anywhere, whether at home or on the go.

Game Modes and Features

  • Cross-Platform Gameplay: Enjoy Elestrals Clash! on both desktop and mobile devices with full account synchronization, so you never miss a beat, no matter where you are.

  • Every Type for Every Player: No matter what element you prefer to Clash with, Casters will immediately have free access to every available card in the game!

  • Casual Play: Test your skills in both fun and competitive environments.

____________________________________________________

Join the Ascent to Immortality — wishlist Elestrals Clash! on Steam now to unlock new horizons and be part of the future of strategic card gaming. Keep an eye out for updates on special events, content drops, and exclusive in-game rewards as we gear up for the official release!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3, 2.4 Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 or equivalent, minimum 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
